Can be used to cast Meteor Shower once, at no Source cost.

A potion that restores your Magic armour.
A potion that restores your vitality. It makes a soft tinkling sound when you shake it.

A very large-sized potion that restores your magical armour.

Character will resurrect one time at full Vitality and Armor instead of dying.
This effect can only occur once, ever.

Dull and grey, the runes carved on this phoenix-shaped idol are barely visible. Upon the base is etched 'Fear not death while flame burns in my heart.' Yet no flame glows. Perhaps there is a way to light it?
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This item cannot be crafted in-combat.

Caution: Potion will override all other resistance potions currently in effect.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This fortifying brew may reek of sour milk, but one gulp will grant you a minor resistance to all types of elemental magic.
Unleash an icy wind, freezing enemies in place and dealing [1].
Breathe flames in a cone, dealing [1] damage leaves fire behind.
Breath rotting fumes in a cone dealing [1] and leaving cursed smoke behind.

Invoke an ancient dragon claw to your weapon and rake the ground in front of you. Three talons deal [1] in a line from center, left and right to all enemies in their path towards you.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enemies struck by talons with either no physical armor or magic armor are subject to a dragon's Frightful Presence.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Frightful Presence paralyzes characters in fear, unable to take actions.
Spew oil in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves sticky tar behind.

Murmur a forbidden secret to your enemies within 5m dealing [1] and cause their very spirit to become racked in torment from the knowledge.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Racked Spirit causes characters to take 15% bonus Piercing damage from all sources.---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enemies killed while suffering from Racked Spirit are pulled through the nether up to 10m away leaving a malformed corpse at the feet of an opponent which explodes dealing [2] in a 3m radius.

Deals [1] to enemies knocking them down and heals allies for [2] then drops rock shards on enemies dealing [3].
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If an enemy is knocked down the shards will apply Bleeding for 2 turns.
Breathes ice in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves frost behind.
Breaths lighting in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves electrified vapor behind.
Spew poison in a cone, dealing [1] and leaves noxious bile behind.

Awaken countless malevolent spirits as a wave of torment dealing [1] and destroy [2] to all enemies in its path.
Destructive power of the wave increases by +5% per meter traveled.

If enemies are suffering from Bleeding or Proliferate their blood becomes Desecrated causing an additional [4] and applying Atrophy.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Desecrated gains 50% more damage from both Strength and Intelligence.

Removes annoying NPCs who loop dialog and otherwise have no purpose.
(This feature cannot be undone)
Allow NPC Vendors to clear their inventory of trash items sold to them every 40 minutes?

Enable / Disable NPC Talent Injection (High) ?
This feature adds Talents just as the normal Talent Injector option. However the number of Talents at lower levels and overal is heavily increased.
(This feature can be turned On or Off at any time.)
Make Sir Lora Immune to damage and Deathfog?

Enabling this mode will grant Erratic Wisp status to all enemies and players at the start of combat.
This is just a joke play mode.

Enable / Disable NPC Talent Injection?
This feature adds Talents specific to different enemy archetypes and alters their stats, skills or weapons accordingly. Just as a player would. The number and weight of talents added will increase as NPC level increases.
(This feature can be turned On or Off at any time.)

Enable / Disable NPC Boost & Buff Injection?
This feature adds stat Boosts specific to different enemy archetypes and random permanent buffs. The value of Boosts increase as NPC level increases.
(This feature can be turned On or Off at any time.)

Curator can sell Conflux related Skill books.
Configure Options:

A military-issue longbow crafted from simple yet functional materials and emblazoned with the insignia of a long-extinct regiment.
Facened metal plates cold to the touch linked together with mithril rivets.
An ancient jar containing countless ghastly shades.
A focal point of raging energy...
In combat a random enemy will be marked. Killing the target heals you.
An ancient idol paying tribute to the chromatic dragons of old. You can sense a presence within.

Ah...
Demon tenacity knows no bounds. My children have ripped part of me through the planes. Your mortal souls are not good enough for keeping...
You will see pure annihilation!
A military-issue longbow emblazoned with the insignia of a long-extinct Ancient Empire regiment.
You defile this sacred place with your presence godwoken, prepare to die

A shadowy shroud of elegant silk that moves along the wind like wisps in the darkness.

Demonic Acuity: allows you to detect and control the vision of others. You reduce enemy stealth attacks by 30% and Blind those attackers for 1 turn through Magic Armor.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If another character is wearing Glaring Abyss. This helm will be imbued with its brother’s power.

Kraven. Are you done with that anvil? We have guests, I said.
Now don't be rude. Let us make room for our new friends...

I'm sure they will make a fantastic addition to our home...
As soul reliquaries.

Shall we brother?
I've grown quite an appetite and can't wait to see how their souls look in our home!

Well, look at this.
It seems we have visitors to our humble dwelling already. We are hardly furnished for guests but I'm certain we can make accommodations for you.

A pristine plated great helm, dark as night. Faint whispers emanate from it's dark visage.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
When you end your turn, the nearest non-ally within 8m is forced to turn and meet your gaze. Abyssal Gaze: will emit a cone of pain in the target's direction 8m dealing piercing damage.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If another character is wearing Acumen of Sight. This helm will be imbued with its brother’s power.

So then, it is time to put fate to the test.
Prepare yourself.

Your efforts to save the paladin are commendable.
My hopes are he will tell others of the atrocities being committed here.
Had fate dealt a different hand perhaps we could have been allies. Alas, we cannot.

I hoped you could save the paladin since I could not...
He could have told others of the atrocities being committed here.
Something I am forbidden from doing.
Shut up and get this over with!

I am, was, a paladin of the divine order.
I swore an oath to Alexander, the son of Lucian. I hoped to help guide him with the teaching of his father but I was naive. That witch of a woman has his ear now and he listens to no one else. My oath, my purpose, is empty.

I now serve the only part of my oath I can by preventing prisoners from escaping this place. I can tell you are not one to let fate have the final say and will not stop.
Death is the only finality in your story.
Don't take all of Gareth's Milk.

Teaches all vanilla Grenade recipes.
Drop me if you want.
Morph your weapon to a chosen Element...
I am the true god of magic and I do not accept prayers. Only your source...
You seek an empty tomb of unanswered prayers.
Pliant protection that bends and bolsters in equal measure.

A platinum handled axe with serrated bone of some sort as used as its edge.

A platinum handled axe with serrated bone of some sort as used as its edge.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Grants the wielder immunity to Poison surfaces while absorbing them to restore Physical Armor.

Grants constant Elemental Affinity for fire damage skills. Does not stack with Talent given Affinity.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cloud Mind: allows the wearer to remove themselves from the minds of enemies until the end of their first turn.

You'll need both hands to hold this sword aloft. Better make sure you don't need them for anything else.

contentList.content: Drain [1] from target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> with magic armor. If their armor is depleted, excess lifeforce will be drained granting either to yourself.

[1] provides +[2] Max AP, +[3] Recovery AP, +[4]% Vitality, +[5]% Physical Armour, +[6]% Magic Armour, and double invested points in attributes and combat abilities (except Polymorph ability), while you are adventuring solo or with at most one companion. This bonus is temporarily removed while there are more than two members in the party.
[1] increases your Action Point recovery by [2] when your health is below [3]%. Bolsters physical and elemental defense up to 30% as health diminishes further from damage taken.

Shooting any arrow will inflict 20% more damage and apply status effects depending on the elemental surface type your target is standing in. Additionally gain a 33% chance to recover special arrows after shooting them.
Take the first step towards godhood. All primary attributes are increased and you gain +1SP at the start of each turn.
Take the first step towards godhood. All primary attributes are increased by [2] and you gain +1SP at the start of each turn.
Deal [1] to a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>. Damage is increased by 250% if you are sneaking or invisible. Target is killed instantly if below 20% Vitality.
Attack a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> with meticulous aim dealing [1] in one shot. When performed from Stealth this attack deals +200% increased damage.
Increase the range of a targeted <font color='#F3D347'>character's</font> ranged attacks and skills by 4m in addition they become immune to Blind, gain 20% accuracy and 5% critical strike chance.
Sing, dealing [1] and causing <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> in the target area to become Mad. Characters driven mad by this skill will only attack other affected targets.
Perform a heavy attack that deals [1] but leaves you open to enemy attacks.
Perform three quick attacks each dealing [1] while remaining elusive to enemy attacks.

Cleanse the following negative statuses from yourself: Silenced, Slowed, Crippled, Chilled, Shocked, Plague, Suffocating, Atrophy, Weakness, Diseased, Congeal, Accelerant, Entangled, Lasting Cruelty and Shackles of Pain.
Gain immunity to these effects in addition to Frozen, Petrified, Stunned and Knocked Down for 1 turn.

Consume oil surfaces around you converting them into Physical Armour.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cleanse Acid, Congeal, Crippled, Slowed and Entangled. Grants immunity to Stunned, Slow and Acid for 2 turns.

You and each ally consume oil surfaces around them converting the oil into Physical Armour.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cleanse Acid, Congeal, Crippled, Slowed, Stunned and Entangled. Grants immunity to Stunned, Slow and Acid for 2 turns.
Heal a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> and create a water puddle beneath them. Cleanse Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned, Virulent, Proliferate, Bleeding and Fire King's Wrath.

Heal yourself and <font color='#11D77A'>allies</font> around you. Create a water puddle beneath every target. Cleanse Necrofire, Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned, Virulent, Proliferate Bleeding, Suffocation, Acid and Fire King's Wrath.

Consume water or frozen water surfaces around you converting water into Vitality or frozen water into Magic Armor.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cleanse Burning, Accelerant, Necrofire and Fire King's Wrath.

You and each ally consume water or frozen water surfaces around them converting water into Vitality or frozen water into Magic Armor.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cleanse Burning, Accelerant, Necrofire, Disarmed, Frozen and Fire King's Wrath.
Sets Hasted on target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>. Haste increases movement speed by 1.5m per AP and gives an additional [2] AP per turn. Cleanse Slowed, Congeal and Crippled.

Motivate yourself or target ally with the power of rage. Target allied character gains +100% Critical Chance but is Muted.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Clears: Taunted and Clear-Minded. Grants Immunity to Terrified, Charmed and Sleep.

Target <font color='#11D77A'>ally</font> enters Cryogenic Stasis. Though incapacitated, they become immune to all damage and heal over time. Cleanse Shackles of Pain and most other status effects then applies Rested for one turn when the stasis ends.
Your heart pumps liquid metal creating a robust layer gaining [1]. This restores [2] each turn. While active you gain 15% physical resistance.
Provides [1] to target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>. While Fortified, the target cannot be teleported. Cleanse Poisoned, Bleeding, Burning, Acid, Decaying and Knockdown.
Restore Vitality of a target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>. Restoration also cures Poisoned and Bleeding.
Target <font color='#F3D347'>character's</font> Dodge chance is increased by 50% and Movement Speed is increased by 1m.

[1] adds 50% more damage, gaining 2% per level and [2]m range to your grenade throws. Increased damage affects statuses, surfaces and detonated objects such as traps. In addition your expertise can grant extra crafting results or 25% chance to quickly assemble a duplicate of thrown grenades with no material costs.

Release a boon of Blessed Steam healing yourself, allies and enemy undead for [2] then regenerates for 3 turns.
Cleanses allies of Frozen, Chilled, Diseased, Weakness, Decaying, Virulent, Congeal, Proliferate and Necrofire.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This regeneration can combine with other sources including the surface created.
Swapping weapons no longer has an action point cost and you no longer provoke attacks of opportunity. You may also pick up items one at a time during combat refunding each action point cost.

[1] absorbs surfaces protecting you from them and instead restores you. Blood restores vitality, poison or oil restore physical armor. Fire, ice or electrified water restore magic armor. This includes Cursed surface types and does not absorb normal Poison if the character is Undead.

[1] increases the range of skills and scrolls by [2]m and grants two specialized skills. Source Phylactery allows the user to regain a source point. Overload grants the user +25% more damage on their next magic attack or +35% more elemental damage on their next ranged attack. Both abilities can be used once per combat.
Leap through the air towards target position dealing [2] melee damage to <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font>, creating a fire surface and apply cripple upon landing.

Teleport without breaking sneak.
If performed while sneaking the skill AP cost is removed.

Teleport without breaking sneak.
If performed while sneaking the skill AP cost is removed.

[1] gives specialized Runes that can only be used by characters with this talent granting unique stats and effects for weapons, amulets, chest armor or shields. Also allows the crafting of a rune slot on these item types.

While at or above 90% Vitality, gain 20% critical chance and the ability to always deal Glancing Blows of 50% damage for dodged or missed attacks. Additionally critical hits can become Savage Criticals causing 50% more damage. The chance of dealing a Savage Critical is equal to 25% of your critical chance stat.
[1] shrugs off the first of any negative status attempt each turn. Also reduces negative status durations by 1 turn but does not affect statuses with a duration of 1 turn.

[1] allows retaliation against dodged or missed attacks with a quick dagger fling that slows the attacker while granting you extra movement speed. Additionally gain a 20% chance to avoid projectiles including magical ones.

Causes an explosive reaction dealing physical damage in an area each time you are struck for 5% or more vitality damage. Volatile reactions intensify as vitality diminishes until you explode in a bloody cloud when you die, dealing [2]% of your maximum vitality as physical damage in a [3] meter radius. Also causes erratic alterations to normal surfaces transforming them into random blessed ones.

[1] grants +30% movement when affected by any movement reducing or immobilizing effects. When afflicted by a status that causes total loss of control you gain two avoidance charges for two turns. When the status ends or is removed you will easily escape danger of the next two attempts.

Gain +4 Perseverance.

Restore 5% of your maximum vitality each turn. If resurrected, revive with 100% vitality. When a healing skill is cast by you or targets you apply an aura boon that restores vitality and armor to yourself and allies within 4m. This boon also restores characters who start their turn within the area.
[1] gives you 20% Dodge while dual wielding and you can no longer be flanked by any number of opponents.
Teleport without breaking sneaking. If used while sneaking AP cost is removed.

Grants 50% bonus Armor before dealing [1]. If your Physical Armour is higher than your opponent's when striking then destroy all their Physical Armour and knock them down. Armor bonus gained lasts 2 turns.

Failure is not an option. Raise the stakes by limiting the already highly challenging Strategist Mode to a single save game. If your entire party perishes, the save game is erased and your quest is well and truly over!

Dagger attack that deals [1] to a character then sets Bleeding and Terrified. Gain 25% increased damage if performed while sneaking.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target is already Bleeding or Proliferated then apply Terrify through Magic Armor.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target has either no physical or magic armor apply Lasting Cruelty dealing [2] each turn and when the target performs an action.

Bless target character or surface. Cleanse Disease, Decay, Crippled, Petrified, Stunned, Frozen, Madness, Atrophy, Necrofire, Slow, Silence, Blind, Lasting Cruelty, Knocked Down, Entangle, Accelerant, Congeal, Virulent, Proliferate and most other statuses.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Does not cleanse talent specific statuses.
[1] grants Dodge, Resistance and Initiative bonuses to all <font color='#11D77A'>allies</font> in a 14m radius.
With [1], you start every combat round with Maximum AP but Magic and Physical Armour do not protect you from statuses. To enable this Talent remove Lone Wolf using the Conflux Config Orb.
Target totem or summon deals [1]% more base damage.

Deal 7% more damage for every status currently afflicting your target. This includes all damage types, surfaces, DoTs and move effects that deal damage or destroy armor values. Does not count extra statuses from Two Kings United.

Gain the ability to take advantage of combat conditions allowing attacks of opportunity. These attacks deal 20% more damage. In addition when an opponent is rendered helpless by loss of control statuses, take advantage by landing an opposing armor type control status. The resulting effect will free them but deal savage damage and hinder based on the control type. Attacks from this talent are not subject to reflected damage.
Creates an oil surface. Slows <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> and deals [1] within 2m of impact.

Deal 15% more damage to characters you have not yet damaged. Using Sabotage and Mass Sabotage skills will instantly take all traps off cooldown. Also reduce the cost of entering sneak mode by 3 AP or remove the cost entirely when inside non-cursed Smoke and Steam clouds.

Gain +4 Sneaking.

Failure is not an option. Raise the stakes by limiting the already highly challenging Strategist Mode to a single save game. If your entire party perishes, the save game is erased and your quest is well and truly over!
For yourself and nearby <font color='#11D77A'>allies</font>, Dodging is increased by 50% and Movement Speed is increased by 1m.
An electrical bolt falls from the sky, dealing [1] to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in the area applying Shock and Dazed.
Coat your weapons with poison, adding [1] with an application of Poison to your weapon skills and attacks.
<font color='#11D77A'>Allies</font> in range receive Venom Coating, which adds [1] with an application of Poison to weapon skills and attacks.

Turn a nearby character to stone dealing [1] and applies Slow through Armor Defenses.

Removes Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, and Crippled.

A storm approaches and strong winds rise that Blinds and deal [1] to enemies in the target area.

Blind caused by this skill cannot be resisted by Armor Defenses.

[1] gives you +[2] to your Memory attribute and an additional point for every 4 character levels. You may also memorize and cast skills ignoring one point of any requirements needed (excluding Polymorph). Your superior wisdom grants Flowing Thought which improves Armor by +1% and Vitality by +3% for every 5 memory slots you posses.
(Boosts to skills do not affect damage values)

Create a cloud of Cursed Smoke in an area Suffocating, Blinding and Slowing characters through defenses.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Suffocation with linger 2 turns after leaving the cloud and Blindness for 1 turn.
Fire 15 arrows in a [1] degree arc at <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font>. Each arrow deals [2] and pierces through one target.

Create a 4m circular area at target location. For two turns you will reflexively shoot at enemies moving in or out of this area dealing [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Arrows fired in this manner will apply Bleeding and Slow through Armor defenses lasting 2 turns. Skill has 5 charges.
Throw a knife at target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> dealing [1]. This attack can backstab and when performed while sneaking will deal +50% increased damage.

A seething dagger attack that deals [1] to a character then sets Decay, Diseased and Lingering Corruption for 2 turns.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target's magic armor is depleted while suffering from Lingering Corruption they will be Cursed for 2 turns.

Pierces the enemy's armour and directly deals [1]. Applies Bleeding if the enemy has no Physical Armour and Gouges the enemy for 3 Turns if they are suffering from Bleed or Proliferate.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
While Sneaking deals +50% increased damage and applies both Bleeding then Gouged through Armor.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gouge causes the target to take 15% bonus piercing damage from all sources.

While active, instead of dying you will produce a Soul Ward protecting you from all damage sources. The ward can absorb an amount of damage equal to your maximum physical and magic armor values combined.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Additional sources of Armor will improve the efficiency of absorbed damage while active. Soul Ward has a duration of 4 turns.
Instead of dying character will be protected by a Soul Ward.
Single-Handed increases damage when using melee weapons and a shield. Gain Glancing Blows for 2 turns after attacking, which grants a chance to reduce incoming melee and projectile damage.

Increasing this ability shrinks NPC sight cones and improves your movement speed while sneaking.

Enemies will remain unaware of a sneaking character until struck by that character. If you sneak again after a strike other enemies will still lose track of you.

[1] restores Magic Armour after you recover from [2] or [3], and restores Physical Armour after [4] or [5].

If you have 5 or more ranks in this skill you restore either armor type instead of being crowed controlled by the effect.
This effect can only occure once per Armor type each combat.

[1] reflects received attack or magical damage back to the attacker.

If you have 5 or more ranks in this skill you will restore 10% vitality damage taken from characters at all times.

Allies in within 8m redirect [1]% of received damage to you.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gain +25% Glancing Blows for 2 turns.
This effect can only stack with Glancing Blows granted by the Single-Handed skill.

Conjure a personal elemental that matches the ground surface it's summoned onto.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Incarnate is summoned with Power and Ranged infusion but can be further buffed with other Infusions.
Once you hit Summoning level of 10, an Incarnate Champion will answer your call.

Taunt enemies around you. Taunted enemies are more likely to attack you.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gain +25% Glancing Blows for 2 turns.
This effect can only stack with Glancing Blows granted by the Single-Handed skill.
Control the forces of nature, gaining <font color='#40B606'>+2 movement </font>for you and <font color='#11D77A'>allies</font> within a 15m radius.

Snakes grow out of your head, giving you a Petrifying aura and the Petrifying Visage skill. Enemies who move close or start their turn within 3m are Petrified.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Aura can only apply once per turn. Incompatible with Bull Horns.

Steal a casted buff with a duration at random from the target enemy. Gain the stolen effect at a new 5 turn duration.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This effect will bypass Armor defenses.
Buffs do not include effects produced by an attack or talent.
Heals target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> for [2]. Cures Crippled, Knocked Down, Blind, Silenced, Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, Diseased, Weakness and Disarmed.

Character is disarmed!
Cured by First Aid, Cryotherapy, Vitalize, Bless.

Send a wave of healing to target another character. The wave travels to other nearby characters, healing allies and damaging enemy undead.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cures Poisoned, Diseased and Virulent.

Sets off a chain reaction causing ice surfaces to explode and melt, dealing water damage to all characters in ice while removing Frozen status. If Frozen is removed from an enemy deal an additional [1] to them.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Piercing damage gains more damage from Strength, Finesse or Intelligence, whichever is highest.

Deal [1] to target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>. When they try to move, they will take piercing damage every 1.5m traveled. If performed while Sneaking, they will take piercing damage every 0.75m traveled.
Destroy [1] on target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>. Apply Silence.
Destroys [1] on target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> then tries to set Sleeping.

Deal [1] to target character and apply Atrophy.
When performed while sneaking deal 50% increased damage..
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If the character is afflicted by Silence, bypass armor to apply Atrophy.
Jump over an <font color='#D7001F'>enemy</font>, landing behind their back and backstabbing them for [1].

Always gain 25% of your Strength or Finesse increase as more damage to magic attacks and 25% of your Intelligence increase as more damage to weapon attacks. When you perform a weapon attack gain +25% more damage to your next magic attack. When you cast a magic attack gain +25% more damage to your next weapon attack.
How much chance you have to land a critical strike when attacking using a skill or item that deals damage.

You and allies instantly recover [1] then regenerate [2] at the start of each character's turn while inside the aura effect.
Cleanse Suffocate and Burning when cast.

You and allies instantly recover [1] then regenerate [2] at the start of each character's turn while inside the aura effect.
Cleanse Acid and Slowed when cast.

Shoot an arrow that goes straight through enemies. Each enemy that's hit takes [1]. Applies Bleeding.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If any target is already suffering from Bleeding or Proliferate then apply Mark of the Fang for 2 turns.
Mark of the Fang causes all damage against the enemy to deal 10% bonus damage and lifesteal regardless of armor values.
Destroy [1] on target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> then set Acid and Atrophy.
Destroy [1] on target <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in an 8m cone then set Acid and Atrophy.
<font color='#D7001F'>Enemies</font> in a [2]m around you take [1]. You receive a status that Blinds enemies within the radius and grants you +20% Air Resistance.
An electrical jolt deals [1] to target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> and applies Shocked.
Touch target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> within 2m dealing [2] then apply Shocked.
Cause target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> to teleport in a random direction each time they are attacked. Increases Air Resistance by [1]%.
Deals [1] to a target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> within 2m then applies Suffocation and Silence.

Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing. Fortified or Grounded characters cannot be teleported.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(Does not gain added range from high ground)
Shoot a bolt of lightning at <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> that forks up to [2] times in a [3] radius and deals [1] to each target.
Deals [1] to <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font>, douses fire and condense all cloud surfaces in the area.
Deals [1] damage to <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> in the area. Caster receives an aura that applies Silence and Suffocating on enemies.
Shoot forking lightning at all <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> within the area dealing [1] and applying Shocked.
Deals [1] to <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> around you applying Shocked. Creates cursed static clouds on the edge of the spell lasting 2 turns.
A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield removing all surfaces and revealing invisible <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font>. Cleanse Burning and Slowed.

Gain 15% Air Resistance and electrify surfaces by moving or standing in them. Your Suffocation status now reduces Elemental Resistances by 5%. Allies will not be shocked or stunned by skills you control. Enemies shocked by you become sapped taking 20% more damage from DoT effects. When combined with an opposing King gain additional perks of Two Kings United.

Gain 15% Earth Resistance while Slow now has the opposite effect on you. Your Acid status now reduces physical resistance by 5% and poison damage caused by you or your summons harm enemy undead at 50% potency. At any point you can release your earth affinity transforming earth damage to physical damage. When combined with an opposing King gain additional perks of Two Kings United.
(Converted physical scales with Geomancy)

Fires an arrow that deals [3] and then finds another enemy target within [2]. Forks up to [1] times.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Elemental Accumulation: If a target has an elemental status such as Burning, Chilled, Proliferate or Slowed the arrow will apply the base status type to the next target struck in the chain while accumulating more.
(This effect takes place after Elemental Ranger)
(Arrow cannot Freeze or Stun)
Deals [1] to <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> and undead <font color='#11D77A'>allies</font> around you while poisoning them. Turns water, blood surfaces and clouds into poison.
Hurl a giant rock filled with sticky oil that deals [1] to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in a 3m radius. Creates an oil surface where it lands.
Cast a magical poisonous dart that deals [1] to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> or heals undead. Creates a puddle of poison.
Throw dust at a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>, blinding them and dealing [1]. Clears surfaces and clouds in the area.
Deal [1] based on your current Physical Armour in a wave of metal spikes to all <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in the area (including yourself).
Spikes impale all <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in the area dealing [1]. Applies Crippled and creates an oil surface.
Poison erupts from the caster in a circular wave dealing [1] to all <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> while forming poison clouds. Grants resilience to poison and earth damage for one turn.
Deal [1] and Knockdown <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> around you. Creates [2] random oil surfaces within the area.

Deals [1] to each <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> in the area. At your command, poisonous worms slither up from the earth, attaching to every character in the area who is not protected by Magic Armour. Affected characters cannot move or teleport and receive poison damage each turn.
Throw dust at all <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> in range, blinding them and dealing [1]. Clears surfaces and clouds in the area.
Shoot spores of corrosive acid at three chosen locations dealing [1] to all <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font>.
Ice forms a defensive barrier around target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> providing [1]. Cures Burning, Poisoned, Stunned, Frozen, Suffocating and Petrified.
Restore Vitality of a target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>. Restoration also cures Poisoned, Bleeding.
Icicles fall from the sky chilling <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> and dealing [1]. They create Ice surfaces where they hit the ground.
Set Vampiric Hunger on target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>, adding [1]% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality.
Deal [1] and set Chilled status on <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> in the area. Freeze blood and water surfaces.
Target 3 positions and shoot an ice shard at each one, dealing [1] to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> applying Chilled.
Deal [1] and set Chilled on <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> around you. Freeze all susceptible surfaces.
<font color='#F3D347'>Characters</font> in the cone that are Frozen and below 20% Vitality shatter and instantly die. Otherwise they receive [1] and become Frozen.

Heal target ally for [1] +10% of their maximum vitality. Restore 50% and [2] per turn.
Cleanse Frozen, Stunned, Petrified, Plague, Suffocating, Poisoned, Burning, Necrofire, Terrified, Silenced, Taunted, Mad.
[3] ice shards rain from the sky, each dealing [1] to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> within [4] range of impact.
Create a spreading water surface which douses fires. Set Wet status on <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in the area.

Target character consumes blood surfaces around them restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they will be restored. Removes Bleeding and Proliferate.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Target gains Blood Saturation: Infuse the character for 2 turns restoring 25% vitality from damage taken by the next attack or spell. If Bleeding or Proliferate were removed add additional charges for each.
Deal [1] to target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>. Sets Decay, so the target will take physical damage from healing spells and potions.
Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitoes to suck the blood from target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> dealing [1], healing yourself and applying Bleeding.
Deal [1]. Infect a target with a disease that will spread to other nearby characters. Diseased <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> deal reduced damage with all attacks and have lowered Vitality.

Target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> receives an increase in damage equal to the percentage of their missing Vitality. For example, a character with 30% vitality will gain 52% damage increase.
Mark a target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> so that it will receive all the damage you receive. Damage transferred in this way ignores any resistances the target may have.
Destroy [1] and silence all <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> within a cone in front of you.
Undead hands rise from underground, attacking <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> that stand in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals [1] to each character and applies Crippled.
The sky weeps bloody tears. Bolts of coagulated blood fall on <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> in the area setting Disease and Decaying Touch. Turns all water in the area into blood.
Spawn bone totems near every <font color='#D7001F'>enemy</font> in the area. Bone totems have ranged attacks that deal [1].
Harm yourself to bring an <font color='#11D77A'>ally</font> back to life. Deals [1] to you and resurrects target ally with maximum Vitality.
Create blood surfaces. Set Bleeding on <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font>. Douse fire surfaces.

Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead, making you see red. You can rush at your <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 1 for the duration. Incompatible with Medusa Head.
Turn the target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> into a chicken. Squawk!
Lash out at target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> dealing [1] and setting Atrophy on them.

Spider legs burst from your back. You can create web surfaces in an area to entangle other <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font>. Walking on Webbed surfaces will make you Hasted rather than entangled. Incompatible with Wings.
Deal [1] and Petrify <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> around you.
Rush at your <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font>, dealing [1] and apply Bleeding.
Sets <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> around you on fire. Deals [1] to each. Ignites all susceptible surfaces.

Target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> gains Clear-Minded, increasing Strength, Finesse and Intelligence by [1] and Wits by [2]. Cleanse Blinded, Terrified, Charmed, Taunted, Sleeping, Enraged and Mad.

Deal [1] to target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> and all others within 5m. If the character is affected by Burning or Necrofire, remove those statuses and deal additional damage for each turn of duration remaining.
Shoot three flaming daggers at targets of your choice, each creating a fire surface and dealing [1] to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font>.
Explode target corpse, dealing [1] to all <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in a 4m radius.
Hurl a fiery sphere that will explode, dealing [1] to all <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font>.
Evoke a line of intense heat that deals [1] to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> and leaves fire clouds behind.
Explode, creating fire surfaces and dealing [1] to all <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in a large area around you (except areas blocked by obstacles).
Surround yourself in blazing emanation, dealing [1] and applying burning to <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> entering or starting their turn in the area.
Explode all corpses around you, dealing [1] each to <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in a 4m radius.
Curse target to <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> explode after one turn or on death, dealing [1] in a 3m radius.
Fire a cursed flame at <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> which will fork on impact up to [1] times, dealing [2] and leaving a cursed fire surface in its wake.
Mid-range attack that deals [1] damage to a target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font>, leaving them Blind and Burning.
Vitality and Armour percentages of <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font> in target area are summed up and redistributed equally.
Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [1], [2], [3], [4] or [5] based on the target's lowest resistance. Creates a random surface.

Fracture the ethereal plane causing bolts of erratic magic energy to strike enemies within a 10m radius. Each bolt deals [1], [2], [3], [4] or [5] based on the target's lowest resistance while creating a random surface.

During the storm your magic and attacks will warp causing drastic changes from their original form also hitting targets based on their lowest elemental resistance.

Gain a +10% bonus damage to attacks for every nearby character, including yourself.

Cannot stealth during this effect.
Rush forward in a straight line to target location hitting all <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> in your path, dealing [1] and applying Knockdown.
Smash your weapon into the ground dealing [1] to <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> in front of you and knocking them down. Clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds.
Throw your shield at an <font color='#D7001F'>enemy</font> dealing [1]. The shield can bounce to another enemy in [2] range.

Deal [1] and cripple a character with a sweeping blow also hitting characters around it.
If targets are suffering from movement reduction, cripple will ignore defenses.
Jump from one <font color='#D7001F'>enemy</font> to another, hitting up to [1] targets and dealing [2] to each. Targets are chosen randomly in a [3] radius.
Perform a whirlwind attack hitting <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> around you for [1].

Mark target <font color='#D7001F'>enemy</font>. Taunting them and all enemies within 4m of them. If the mark dies in the next 3 turns, you are healed and receive damage and armour bonus. If the mark survives, their Vitality is healed to full and caster receives damage.
Attack a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> 5 times with astonishing speed, each hit dealing [1].
Turn a target <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> into a chicken unable to perform actions.

Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead making you see red. You can rush at your <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 1 for the duration. Incompatible with Medusa Head.
Lash out at an <font color='#D7001F'>enemy</font> dealing [1] and setting Atrophy.

Spider legs burst from your back. You can create web surfaces in an area to web <font color='#F3D347'>characters</font>. Walking on Webbed surfaces will make you Hasted rather than enwebbed. Incompatible with Wings.
Snakes grow out of your head giving you a Petrifying aura against <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> and the Petrifying Visage skill. Incompatible with Bull Horns.

Summon a mechanical bomber at target position. The bomber can explode, dealing fire damage and producing a fire surface.
(Not affected by combat Summon Sickness)

Target a corpse to raise a bloated cadaver that fights for you. It can explode, dealing Physical Damage.
(Not affected by combat Summon Sickness)
Deals [1], releasing a witch’s curse reducing all primary attributes by <font color='#FF0100'>[2]</font> and total Vitality by <font color='#FF0100'>-15%</font>.
Shatters on impact dealing [1], embedding shards of pure silver causing enemies to bleed. When the arrow strikes undead or voidwoken it deals +30% bonus damage.
The Sallow Man's enfeebling influence. Can be cured by Bless, Steam Lance and Vitalize.
Will drive all in a [1] radius mad.
You feel the power of your allies praying to you. Their devotion is providing you with <font color='#46B195'>+1 Source</font> per turn.
Suffocates nearby <font color='#D7001F'>enemies</font> and attempts to Silence them.

You have unmatched mobility allowing for more deadly attacks and evasive defense. For every 2m you move in combat gain +1% more damage, dodge chance and resistance to elements. Effects last until the start of your next turn.
Also gain an additional [2] AP of free movement per turn.
(Skills do not count towards movement)
Target terrain to create a 4m radius smokescreen. Deals no damage.
Creates a smoke curtain with a 5m radius.
Destroy [1] on target enemy. They are Terrified for 1 turn.

Approaching allies will be healed.
Starting their turn in range will be healed.

The earth itself laments your plight, crying curative tears which heal [1] all allies that move close to you for aid.
Each heal instance lasts 3 turns.

Rush at your enemies dealing [1] and apply Bleeding.
If targets are suffering from movement reduction, trample and cripple them ignoring defenses.
Upon death, heal the wearer of Devourer Armor.
The Captain's capricious mastery is restored with a complete set, boosting the amours' level to 8. An aura of looming intimidation surrounds the wearer.
Bind yourself to target <font color='#11D77A'>ally</font>, copying any healing or armour restoration you receive to them. Clears Frozen, Stunned, Knocked Down, and Petrified from target.
Set Vampiric Hunger on every <font color='#11D77A'>ally</font> around you, adding [1]% Life Steal. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality.

Gain +[2]% bonus Vitality for every point in Warfare you have and immunity to Decay.
Healing for a cumulative 25% of your maximum vitality demoralizes enemies and rallies allies within 6m. Intensity and duration of these effects increase each time you meet the healing threshold.

Each time you cast an offensive Fire, Earth, Air, Water or Poison spell gain 10% More elemental damage and take 5% Less damage from all elements. This bonus stacks for each unique element cast but will reset if you cast the same element twice. Dual elemental spells will count as an element you have not yet cast if possible. Effects count towards all sources of elemental damage.

Enemies within 8m may become intimidated.
Causes -1 AP recovery, reduced accuracy, dodge, initiative and perseverance.
In combat a random enemy will be marked. Killing the target heals you.

Throw an explosive trap at a target location. If the trap is not detonated by proximity it deals [1]. The trap takes 1 turn to activate. While active the trap will deal [2] when a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> is near or approaches it.

Throw [1] explosive traps at target locations. If the trap is not detonated by proximity it deals [2]. When active each trap will deal [3] when a <font color='#F3D347'>character</font> is near or approaches it.

content.Comment: THESE KEYS ARE USED FOR LUA UI OVERRIDE TEXT. COMBAT SKILLS AND TALENTS

contentList.content:
[1] grants +1% Physical Resistance and +2% Elemental Resistance bonus to all allies in a 14m radius.

If you have 5 or more ranks in this skill you also gain these bonuses in combat.
Level [1]: +XORN_PRES% physical resistance and +XORN_ERES% to all elemental resistances.
Next Level [1]: +XORN_PRES% physical resistance and +XORN_ERES% to all elemental resistances.

Thaumaturgy Warlord grants you the ability to morph your weapons into different elements on a whim. You may change your weapons to Physical or any Element of your choice permanently as many times as you wish. You may combine up to two melee spark skills at once causing the first enhancement to fork additional sparks of the second at half potency.
Dual Wielding increases damage, Dodge and Critical Multiplier when dual-wielding two one-handed weapons.
Level [1]: +XORN_DWDAMAGESTRING% Damage, +XORN_DODGESTRING% Dodge and XORN_CRITSTRING% Crit Multiplier.
Next Level [1]: +XORN_DWDAMAGESTRING% Damage, +XORN_DODGESTRING% Dodge and XORN_CRITSTRING% Crit Multiplier.

With [1], certain statuses caused by you are no longer blocked by Magic or Physical Armour, and their duration is extended by one turn. Burning, Poisoned, Bleeding, Necrofire, Acid, Suffocating, Entangled and Ruptured Tendons are affected by this talent.

Gain 15% Water Resistance with Immunity to Frozen and Slipping. An aura of Permafrost surrounds the character slowing nearby enemies allowing Chill to bypass Magic Armor. At any point the character can cure nearby allies of cold statuses releasing an Icy Nova intensified by cold statuses affecting enemies. When combined with an opposing King gain additional perks of Two Kings United.

Gain 15% Fire Resistance and become empowered by flame. Burning and Necrofire are applied to you through armor. When affected by Burning or Necrofire; Fire King's Prowess will grant +1AP recovery and movement per turn. At any point the character may unleash their flames to inflict an AoE wave causing fire damage and intense burning. When combined with an opposing King gain additional perks of Two Kings United.

Thaumaturgy Warlord grants you the ability to morph your weapons into different elements on a whim. You may change your weapons to Physical or any Element of your choice permanently as many times as you wish. Additionally up to two melee spark skills can be combined at once, causing the first enhancement to fork additional sparks of the second at half potency.
Living Armour restores 35% of all healing received to both Physical Armor and Magic Armor.
Conflux Configuration Orb has many features including game difficulty options, removal of annoying NPCs, origin character tag swaps like villain and a backup vendor for new skills.
